Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mutant embryos have reduced size , fail to gastrulate or express a mesodermal marker , and show abnormal visceral endoderm development .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| reduced size |
| failure to gastrulate |
| abnormal visceral endoderm development |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| abnormal visceral endoderm development |

The other two entities, "reduced size" and "failure to gastrulate," do not clearly refer to a disease, so they are not included in the table.
